review_details: Thoroughly enjoyed our day fishing,swimming, eating and drinking. Very well looked after with coffee and cake first thing in the morning and a seafood feast for lunch, washes down with home made wine.
Top notch food as always, best burger around! Really like the house pilsner also. Quick and friendly service.
Recently visited for friends wedding and cannot recomendable enough, great service & food. As a venue itâ€™s fantastic, a very luxurious feel.
